word:
You will be in danger of making mistakes if you move out in your own supposed wisdom. You need counsel. You have not the efficiency 


                      - 48 - 

for all classes of labor, and you should not commence work in important places if there is danger that you will lay a foundation which you cannot complete. Light must be expressly given by God, and duty must be clear and unmistakable before one or two men enter new and important fields. You need to counsel with your brethren; for there is danger that you will run too fast in devising plans and methods.
